MRP.MRPHallbachArrayGenerator

generates magnet structures out of given readings and export hallbach rings

class MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayGenerator

Contains static functions to generate a 3D CAD Model of a Hallbach-Magnet using given readings.

static generate_1k_hallbach_using_polarisation_direction(_readings: [<class 'MRPReading.MRPReading'>], _min_slice_inner_diameter: float = 20, _slice_outer_diameter_safety_margin: float = 10) → MRPHallbachArrayResult

Generates a 1K hallbach array out of given readings. The result is a set of magpylib magnets with set rotation, position and dimension. The magnetization is calculated using the calculate_center_of_gravity function. Magnets are aligned on their Z axis.

Parameters:

  • _readings (MRPReading.MRPReading) – a list of readings to generate a 1k hallbach array, length needs to be multiply of 4

  • _min_slice_inner_diameter (float) – minimum hallbach ring inner diameter can be bigger depending the magnet size

  • _slice_outer_diameter_safety_margin (float) – additional

Returns:

returns magnet (magpylib) instances with set dimensions, rotation and position

Return type:

MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayResult

static generate_magnet_streamplot(_computed_magnet_data: [<class 'MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayResult'>], _save_filename: str | None = None)

Generates a Hallbach Stream-Field Line Plot of a given MRPHallbachArrayResult object

Parameters:

  • _computed_magnet_data ([MRPHallbachArrayResult.MRPHallbachArrayResult]) – a list of magnet result object MRPHallbachArrayResult containing computed magnets

  • _save_filename (str) – save .scad file to filepath e.g. ./tmp/export.scad

static generate_openscad_model(_computed_magnet_data: [<class 'MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayResult'>], _save_filename: str | None = None, _2d_object_code: bool = True, _add_mounting_holes: bool = True, _add_annotations: bool = True)

Generates a Hallbach OpenSCAD file of a given MRPHallbachArrayResult object

Parameters:

  • _computed_magnet_data ([MRPHallbachArrayResult.MRPHallbachArrayResult]) – a list of magnet result object MRPHallbachArrayResult containing computed magnets

  • _save_filename (str) – save .scad file to filepath e.g. ./tmp/export.scad

  • _2d_object_code (bool) – adds openscad projection(cut = true) to allow the generation of dxf files

  • _add_mounting_holes (bool) – adds additional mounting holes

  • _add_annotations (bool) – adds text annotations using magnet_id and type

static plot_vectors(_vectors: [vector.Vector3D], _name: str = 'Vector Plot', _file: str | None = None)

Helperfunction to plot a list of 3D vectors using matplotlib

Parameters:

  • _vectors ([vector.Vector3D]) – reading

  • _name (str) – headline of the plot

  • _file (str) – if set, saves the plot as png to given path

exception MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayGeneratorException(message='MRPHallbachArrayGeneratorException thrown')
with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.

class MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayResult

contains the generated data returned after calling a generation method e.g. generate_1k_hallbach_using_polarisation_direction
